column1: Little Goat Diner////What an interesting and expansive menu!  It was really tough to choose
column2: but I ordered the Duck Bahn Mi.  The meat and vegetables were excellent
column3: the flavors really meshed. My only issue was with the baguette.  It was a bit tough and crusty for a Bahn Mi roll.  We also had a side of Mac & Cheese
column4: which was good but not great
column5: the cheese was a bit too runny. Given it was opening night
column6: I am inclined to believe that these kinks will be ironed out.  Also
column7: I should note that I really enjoyed the ginger ale
column8: which had a serious kick to it. There are probably a dozen things on the menu that I am excited to try
column9: so I will definitely be back!
